DOC.detailed_description: Subjects type 1 diabetes invite provide usual blood glucose monitoring blood glucose profile ( Pre/ post prandial Blood Glucose + Night Blood Glucose ) 3 occasion 2 week time period , addition filling questionnaire include fear hypoglycemia-2 questionnaire . Biobanking urine/blood Collection key medical information investigator Questionnaires : - socio-economic status - Fear hypoglycemia-2 - Anxiety Depression scale ( HAD ) - Health survey ( SF36 , SF12 ) - Satisfaction treatment ( DHP-18 ) - Dutch Eating Behavior Questionnaire ( DEBQ ) - Pittsburgh quality sleep ( PSQI ) - Blood Glucose diary
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : type 1 diabetes least 2 Blood Glucose monitor daily insulin 5 year Exclusion Criteria : stable metabolic condition ( infection , steroid therapy ) 3 month change insulin treatment clinical trial renal failure ( eDFG 30 ml/min/1.73 mÂ² ) Pregnancy and/or lactation
